attributes.action: ask FIFA to ban South Korea from the World Cup unless they stop killing dogs and cats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dogs and cats are cooped up without food and water, waiting to be butchered alive in South Korea when imports from the fur trade are due to be banned and when South Korea has ample other food sources.  We believe their treatment of dogs and cats is barbaric and unacceptable to the western world and as such they should not be allowed into world sporting events until they legislate against such killing and cruelty.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with FIFA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
